mapper.select: SELECT a.consumerId, b.sellerId, a.productId, a.price, a.count, a.orderDate, a.totalPrice, a.status, b.title FROM `order` a LEFT JOIN product b ON a.productId = b.id where a.id in (${orderIds})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (consumerId, sellerId, productId, count, orderDate, totalPrice, price, status) VALUES(#{consumerId}, #{sellerId}, #{productId}, #{count}, now(), #{totalPrice}, #{price}, '0')
